- Support for ActionScript Workers, which enable developers to create multithreaded applications that can run in the background without affecting the user interface.
- Support for Stage Video Hardware Acceleration across multiple browsers and platforms, which improves the performance and quality of video playback.
- Support for Stage 3D Standard Profile, which enables developers to create rich 3D graphics and games with low-level GPU access.
- Support for Enhanced Mouse Control, which allows developers to create immersive mouse-based games and applications with features such as right and middle click events, mouse lock, relative mouse coordinates, and more.
